summary.span: 提供有关 中的 元素的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the elements within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是的唯一允许的子元素 。 elements are the only allowable child elements of a . 中的元素的顺序 定义了 页的顺序。The order of the elements within the defines the page order. 提供有关中的元素的信息， 而无需应用程序加载单独的页面。 provides information about the elements within a without the requiring the application to load individual pages. 依赖项属性指定对应的 (URI) 的统一资源标识符 。The dependency property specifies the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the corresponding . 有关元素的详细信息 ，请参阅 Xps *开放式 XML 纸张规范* 的第3章，可在 xps 上下载 [：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *Open XML Paper Specification* available for download at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了向添加的过程 。The following example shows the process of adding to a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将 在以下情况返回：The property returns a when: 1. 具有 在标记中定义的直接子 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。 has an immediate child defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup. 2. 已 调用以将设置 为的子 。The has been called to set the as the child of the . 当以下情况时，属性将返回**null** ：The property returns **null** when: 1. 由属性 指定，由属性 (设置，而 不会) 缓存。The is set by the property (when specified by the property, the is not cached). 使用 或 可在 由属性设置时返回 。Use or to return the when set by the property. 有关元素的详细信息 ，请参阅可供下载的 XPS *XML 纸张规范* 的第3章 [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx) 。For more information about the element, see Chapter 3 of the XPS *XML Paper Specification* available for download at [http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpsspec.mspx). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能在 XAML 中使用此属性。You cannot use this property in XAML.

summary.span: 异步加载并返回 内容元素。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步加载并分析 与此关联的数据流 。 asynchronously loads and parses the data stream associated with this . 当完成时，其他线程将继续运行 。Other threads will continue to run while completes. 以下步骤演示了如何以异步方式加载 内容：The following steps illustrate how to load the content asynchronously: 1. 创建一个 委托，并将其添加为事件的通知 。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 调用 。Call . 3. 当 发生事件并且调用委托时， 内容已完成加载。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, the content has completed loading. 加载的 元素通过返回 。The loaded element is returned through the . 属性中找到的值。property. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 xps 规范的第3章，该规范可在 [Xps：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取。For more information about the `` element, see chapter 3 of the XPS specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
